Text: Okay, so there was another torrent I made that was exactly the same but didn't finish, so here's a re-upload of it. If there's any more 99.8% problems, please speak up, and I'll fix it for sure.
THANK YOU. I've been wanting to watch the rest of the season since the person uploading the episodes was unable to get them anymore. I most certainly WILL be going to the next show they play near me.
